I have seen two presentations by Alberto and I think that Agitator has a
bright future in the junit/test-driven community. Alberto is a vocal
proponent of test-driven development and Agitator adds value beyond what is
typically accomplished with TDD alone.

I was originally disappointed that Agitator was not available to download
for evaluation, but I now understand their business strategy better. I found
the people of Agitar passionate about discovering working development
practices and using advanced technologies to ease developer's burden. I wish
them lots of luck.

Regards,
David Vydra
www.testdriven.com
